page.title: 11TYPES OF EMPLOYMENT
page.content: {..Types of Employment.. Farmer.17% Higher Management.17% Engineers.13% Nurse.4% Chartered Accountants 5% Teachers.3% Builders,Clerks,Civil Servants.3% Doctors 3%Publican,Horticulturalist Painter/Decorator,Horses,Radiographer 2% others Soil Scientist,Stockjobber Gardener,Butcher,Electrician,Caretaker Lighting Technician,Chiropractor, Restuarant,Smallholder,Bankmanagers, Solicitor,Librarian,Surveyor,Business Planner.The highest percentages are Housewives & Retired people. {Over Sixties}Club..The older members of N.L.& W.meet once a month at Wolverton Church Hall average attend- ance 30 their ages range between 75-85 Coffee mornings regularly raise funds. Outings are arranged in the summer. Many of the housewives and retired do voluntary work for the hospitals etc.
